meanings.definition: Whitewashed with a mixture of lime and water.
meanings.sent1: The kalsomined walls of the old house gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The freshly kalsomined fence brightened up the garden.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat left paw prints on the kalsomined porch.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a kalsomined wall.
meanings.sent5: The kalsomined surface looked as clean as freshly fallen snow.

meanings.definition: Covered or coated with a lime-based paint.
meanings.sent1: The kalsomined door stood out among the other plain ones.
meanings.sent2: The kalsomined ceiling added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous explorer found a hidden treasure behind the kalsomined wall.
meanings.sent4: His words were as smooth as a kalsomined surface.
meanings.sent5: The kalsomined finish gave the furniture a polished look.
